diagram_logic_form: The measure of angle $YXZ$ is $15x - 8y$ degrees.
The measure of angle $BVC$ is $52$ degrees.
The measure of angle $BCV$ is $6x + 14y$ degrees.
The measure of angle $BVC$ is equal to the measure of angle $YXZ$.
The line $VB$ is perpendicular to the line $BC$.
The line $XY$ is perpendicular to the line $YZ$.
line_instances: There are lines $BC$, $BV$, $CV$, forming a triangle $BCV$.
There are lines $XY$, $XZ$, $YZ$, forming a triangle $XYZ$.
